## Ben Best

[Ben Best](http://www.bdbest.org/cv) is an environmental Data Scientist who launched [Ecoquants](https://ecoquants.com) to support data driven decision making for environmental and ecological problem solving. He will share his path to & thoughts on environmental data science, as well as what EDS-213 Team Science course will be focusing on.
